idea:
iHuman.AI - The Humans behind AI 


We provide data annotation services for Artificial Intelligence/ Machine Learning training. It includes:


1. Text Labeling/ Sentiment Analysis 

2. Image Labeling (Bounding Box, Polygon, Semantic etc.)

3. Object Identification and Video Tagging 

4. Natural Language Processing 

5. Computer Vision 


We have worked with clients across several industries such as Fintech, Legal, Media & Entertainment, Marine Biology, etc. 


Our experienced team comprises domain experts as well as experienced staff comfortable to work on projects from any industry and on any tool. 


If you wish to connect - call on +91 9768725607.
name: iHuman.AI

idea: A S Datachamp was established on 1st August 2017, we are the market leader in business intelligence. There is no point shooting in the air. Winners are those who shoot in the bird’s eye. Target the eye with our correct and precise audience for marketing. We provide segmented services according to the clients’ needs so that the targeted audience can be reached. We deal in various activities such as Event Organizing, Conference Marketing, Workshop/Webinar Lead Generation, Lead Generation for Product or Service, Website Development, Graphic Designing, CMS Development, Social Media Handling. We help our clients to grow their business through digital.
name: A S DATACHAMP

idea:
Even if I have started my new venture M/s. DIVE CONSTRUCTION CONTRACTOR PVT. LTD. as a construction company but my core interest areas are Waste Management, organic fertilizer & renewable energy.


I have completed my B.E. (Civil) in year 2007, from Sardar Patel College of Engineering, Andheri, Mumbai. I am also a PGD holder, in Project Engineering Management, from National Institute of Construction Management and Research (NICMAR), Pune Campus. Later over a period of 10 years, I have worked with renowned construction domain players like M/s. Gherzi Eastern LTD., M/s. Shapoorji Pallonji, M/s. Wadhwa Group, M/s. Radius Group, M/s. Capacite Infra Projects Pvt. LTD. Throughout this journey, I have acquired expertise in project management for multiple 100 Crore projects of these big banner companies. I have developed niche for technical & practical knowledge, client, vendor & cash flow management.



Now I want to use my technical know how to solve SIMPLE YET MAMMOTH issue of waste management (Waste to Wealth) & reduce our dependency on fossil & imported fuels by making my small contribution toward renewable energy sector.
name: DIVE CONSTRUCTION CONTRACTORS PRIVATE LIMITED
